StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateBAR]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @ID int, @PersonID int, @Status varchar(9), @Date date.me, @LastEditBy varchar(15) ) AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [mcriss].[dbo].[BAR] WHERE BAR_ID = @ID) BEGIN UPDATE [mcriss].[dbo].[BAR] SET [SCHEDULED_BAR_DATE] = @Date ,[BAR_ADMISSION_STATUS] = @Status ,[USER_LOGIN] = @LastEditBy ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() ,[MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] = @PersonID WHERE BAR_ID = @ID END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [mcriss].[dbo].[BAR] ([SCHEDULED_BAR_DATE] ,[BAR_ADMISSION_STATUS] ,[USER_LOGIN] ,[UPDATE_DATE] ,[MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID]) VALUES (@Date ,@Status ,@LastEditBy ,GetDate() ,@PersonID) END
